name: BulkUpdateFigmaDevResources
description:
Update multiple Figma dev resources in bulk.

This tool updates developer resources across multiple Figma files. It should be called when you need to apply changes to several resources at once. The response will include arrays indicating which resources were successfully updated and which encountered errors.

parameters.name: dev_resources_to_update
parameters.description: A JSON list of dev resources to update. Each resource should include its unique identifier, name, and URL.

id.description: Unique identifier of the dev resource

name.description: The name of the dev resource.

url.description: The URL of the dev resource.

value_schema.description: A list of dev resources that you want to update.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the figma API.

parameters.description: A list of dev resources that you want to update.
